author: CVGJetGuy
title: Hilton Hospitality in Central Paris -
text:
This hotel, located by the entrance to Gare Saint-Lazare, offers superb Hilton Hospitality in central Paris. A few minutes from the Op√©ra Garnier and the major department stores, this grand railroad hotel with rich local history has been brought up to date with modern comforts and amenities. High-level Hilton service is absolutely present.
The executive lounge on the mezzanine is a little small but offers comforting refreshments. The executive breakfast room offers abundant selections with plenty of morning light streaming through the windows.
Room Tip: Corner suites offer great breezes See more room tips
